trends: There have been no other sightings in cougar reservoir
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was laying in my tent this morning with two friends and it was about 5am. two of us (including me) were awake and laying on our backs looking up at the roof of the tent. suddenly a super bright white light flew over our campsite straight above us. you could see the light clearly through the tent fabric and it looked like a orb. there are many trees shading the campsite from above so it was a view through some tree limbs. the object was about 20 feet above the tree tops and took less than 4 seconds to come and go. there was no approach sound and as it passed a low whine\hum was heard. it sounded like a turbine noise almost but it was not a plane or jet engine and not a helicopter sound either. i have never heard a sound like that. it was amazingly quiet whatever it was. at 5am the sun was just coming up to where we could just barely make out the inside of the tent but still very dark. it tracked a straight line from the direction of our feet to our head as it passed over our tent as if we were just lucky enough to be right under and in line with its projected flight path. i felt mostly tense fear as it flew by. my first and only thought was that it was a ufo. i have seen many and somehow thats just what popped into my head. from the second i saw it to well after it left i was thinking crap i hope that thing doesnt see us.
